title: 捕捉国王-顶点创造|为中间战斗，选择技能，升级你的武器&更多 版本:1.13.x
author: 我不是憨憨
txt_content:
本帖最后由 55555S 于 2018-10-21 15:55 编辑 

[ Capture Kings - Vertex Creations - 捕捉国王-顶点创造 ]
 作者原文：
Map Features:


Getting Points

This map is all about getting points for your team to win! By default, you need to reach 1000 points. However, that can easily be changed through the options, found in the lobby. But, how do you get points in the first place? It's quite simple: Go to the center of the map, where you can find the middle point and stand on it. Additionally, you need to make sure to knock the enemy team off the middle, so that they can't claim any points for themselves!



Capturing Beacons

Along with the middle, there are two small points at the side; Beacons. By standing on them you can capture them, and when captured they will give the whole team a specific buff! Eight different buffs will help you win the game faster and get stronger. However, only two are available in each match! The buffs include but are not limited to Regeneration, Resistance, as well as custom effects such as Golden Grace or Slime's Sabotage.


Buying Items

On the bottom part of your screen there is a number that is constantly increasing, that number represents the amount of gold you have. Gold can be used to buy items or upgrade your gear! Different items have different purposes: Ender pearls for teleporting, orbs of undying for living past your death, walls to quickly block passages of and much more!



Upgrading Equipment

In this map you can find custom upgrading trees for your weapons and armor to make them fit your playing style; For example: fast but weak, slow but strong and more! Upgrade your equipment in the shop to be one step ahead of your enemies!



Selecting Skills

Your items and equipment, however, aren't the only thing supporting you on your journey to defeat your enemies. There is one more, critical element in this map that has a significant impact on fights: Skills. Each player can choose 3 out of 21 different skills, that can be mixed and matched to fit team play and your play style, and each gives you their specific extra-abilities. They can be activated on kills, death or when you take damage! You can choose to strengthen your allies, or perhaps you'd rather have a ton of health? We have skills for every situation and playstyle! Bow-based skills? Yes. Shooting fireballs? We got that covered. Summoning tropical fish on top of your enemies? I'm not sure why you would want that, but yes, we have that! With more than 8 thousand possible combinations, skills give you a chance to change the playstyle to what you want. Can you find the combination that fits you best? You can switch skills in the lobby, or while in-game via the shop.




Choosing Arena

No map would be what it is without great builds - and that's why Capture Kings is equipped with seven unique arenas you can choose to fight in. Each has its own unique features, weaknesses, and layout! Jump on launch pads to get levitated up into the air, enter portals to find quick ways to another place, walk on speed pads to reach the middle quicker and more! You can select an arena in the lobby before a game starts.



Picking Announcer

Have you ever played a map and thought: 'This map would be ten times better if it had random voice lines!', Well... We got the *perfect* map for you! We provide you with nine different voiceovers, going from the most tired worker to the cutest announcer! They'll tell you all the most ** things going on in the map. This is the feature you never knew you always wanted! Each player can select their own announcer in the lobby!



译文：
译文：
地图特点：


获得积分

这张地图就是为了让你的队伍获得积分！默认情况下，您需要达到1000点。但是，可以通过大厅中的选项更改。但是，你如何获得积分呢？这很简单：去到地图的中心，在那里你可以找到中间点并站在它上面。另外，你需要确保从中间击败敌方队伍，这样他们就不能为自己争取任何积分！



捕获信标

在地图的中央，两边各有一个信标;信标，当队伍玩家站在上面时即可控制该信标点 ，并且占领后整个队伍都会获得一个特殊buff！共计8个IMBA的吊炸天buff可以立即逆转战局。但是，每场比赛只有两个！ buff包括但不限于再生，抵抗，以及金币加成buff或史莱姆障碍等自定义效果。


购买物品

在游戏中，有个数字在不断增加，那是您的金币数量，您可以使用金币去购买装备或者升级您的装备；不同的物品有不同的性质，列如可以传送的末影珍珠，还有不死珍珠可以使您复活和能快速阻挡对方的墙壁



升级设备

在游戏中，你可以找到适合你的武器和盔甲的自定义升级树，使它们适合你想要的风格;例如：速度快但很弱鸡，速度慢但强到爆炸而且更多！在商店升级您的装备比您的敌人领先一步！



选择技能

但是，你的物品和装备并不是唯一可以帮助你击败敌人的道路。在游戏中还有一个关键因素对战斗产生重大影响：那就是技能。每个玩家可以选择21种不同技能中的3种，可以混合搭配以快速适应你的团队和你的你想要的风格，每种技能都可以为你提供特定的能力。它们可以在杀人打人，死掉或受到伤害时被激活！你可以选择加强你的队友，或者你宁愿拥有生命值？对于每种对手的进攻风格和各种即时情况,我们都有独特的技能方案来针对他们！啥！基础远程攻击？能射炎爆术吗？可以 点技能就是了 你想问问神奇海螺能不能在敌方队员的脑壳上丢几条热带鱼吗？？我不清楚你脑子有没有秀逗，但是我们的确有做这个技能XD 实际上我们准备了8千个吊炸天的技能 ，技能让您有机会将游戏风格改变为您想要的。你能找到最适合你的组合吗？您可以在大厅或通过商店在游戏中切换技能。



选择竞技场

如果没有出色的构建，没有下一张地图会是什么 - 这就是为什么我们准备了七个独特的竞技场，你可以选择参与战斗。每个竞技场都有自己独特的功能，弱点和布局！跳上发射台，飞到空中，进入传送门，快速找到另一个地方，走上加速垫，可以获得加速buff，使你更快地到达中间！您可以在游戏开始前在大厅中选择竞技场。


播音员

你有没有玩地图的时候有个想法：有个配音员那该多好哇!可这是真的，我们准备了9种不同的配音,从累到炸的播音员到很阔爱的配音员,他们会告诉你地图上发生了什么惊天大事,这是从未有的功能,每个玩家都可以在大厅里选择。


—懒猫译




[ Picture - 美图欣赏 ]




-图源自原帖-

 [ Install - 地图安装 ]
Save存档(正版用户):
1、关闭Minecraft，
2、在Windows资源管理器的路径中输入 %appdata%/.minecraft 。
3、把下载的地图存档解压缩放到. minecraft\saves 文件夹里面。

Schematics存档：
这类型需要MCEdit。
1、下载完成后解压，
2、关闭Minecraft，
3、打开MCEdit.exe，点击下方import按钮，选择你下载的文件，
     最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

- 本地图请使用第一种"Save存档(正版用户)"方法安装使用 -
